text: Finn (originally called FN-2187) is one of the main characters in the 2015 movie Star Wars: The Force Awakens. In the movie, he is a Stormtrooper for the First Order who escapes after being shocked by their cruelty in his first combat mission before joining the fight against them. He is played by English actor John Boyega. Finn became a member of the resistance after he became friends with resistance pilot Poe Dameron. He becomes romantically attached to Rey. ==References== ==Other websites== * Finn in the official StarWars.com encyclopedia Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2015 Category:Star Wars characters
title: Finn (Star Wars)
